column5: English
column11: English

column4: ファウスト＿遠くを見る横顔マント有

信じられん。
神より強い者がいるとは……。
column5:
I don't believe it.
There's someone stronger than God...
column11:
I don't believe it.
There's someone stronger than God...

column4: マリオネーションギア……。
column5: Marionation Gear...
column11: Marionation Gear...

column4:
どうやら、人形の進化は
私の想像すらこえているようだ。
column5: It appears Puppets have evolved beyond my wildest imagination.
column11: It appears mechs have evolved beyond my wildest imagination.

column5:
Kay!
/p!
Anne-Marie!
column11:
Kay!
/p!
Anne-Marie!

column5: It's time for work!
column11: It's time for work!

column5: Are you listening!?
column11: Are you listening!?

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

column5: They must be asleep.
column11: They must be asleep..

column4: メリッサ＿しょうがないな

ま、大活躍だったんだ。
無理もないね。
column5: Well, it's no wonder after everything they've been through.
column11: Well, it's no wonder after everything they've been through.

column4: ガロイ親方＿まいったな

しかたない、
寝かせておいてやるか。
column5: Guess I should let them sleep in?
column11: Guess I should let them sleep?

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

今でも信じられないよ。あの子
たちが工房にやってきたのは、
そう昔のことじゃないのに……。
column5: I still can't believe it. It wasn't that long ago that those kids joined our workshop...
column11: I still can't believe it. It wasn't that long ago that those kids joined our workshop...

column5: You're right.
column11: You're right.

column4:
あの子たちが来てから、
私も、親父も変わったよ。
column5: We've both changed since they came.
column11: We've both changed since they came.

column4:
それに何より、
世界まで変えちまった。
column5: And above all else, the world has changed.
column11: And above all else, the world has changed.

column4:
ホント、
今でも信じられないよ。
column5: I really can't believe it.
column11: I really can't believe it.

column4:
ガファー・アイゼンベルグ
いわく、
column5: According to Gaffer Eisenberg,
column11: According to Gaffer Eisenberg,

column4:
“マリオネーションギアこそ、
　人類の可能性そのものである”
column5: {Marionation Gear is the very potential of humanity itself.}
column11: {Marionation Gear is the very potential of humanity itself.}

column4:
だが、アイゼンベルグですら、
こんな未来は想像して
いなかったかもしれんな。
column5: But even Eisenberg couldn't have imagined a future like this.
column11: But, even Eisenberg couldn't have imagined a future like this.

column4:
意思を持った人形が
人間を滅ぼそうとして……
column5: A Puppet with the intent to overthrow mankind...
column11: A mech with the intent to overthrow mankind...

column4:
人形を操る子供たちが、
それを止めた……。
column5: The children piloting Puppets who stopped it...
column11: The children piloting mechs who stopped it...

column4:
たいしたもんだよ。
子供たち。
column5: They're quite something, those kids.
column11: They're quite something. Those kids.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

オレがマリオネーションギアに
関わるようになって、
もう２０年以上になるか……。
column5: I've been working with Marionation Gear for over 20 years now, probably...
column11: I've been working with Marionation Gear for, probably, over 20 years now...

column4:
だが、どうやら無駄じゃ
なかったらしい。
column5: But it seems that it hasn't all been in vain.
column11: But, it seems that it hasn't all been in vain.

column4:
なにしろ、
期待できそうだからな。
column5: Unexpected things can always happen.
column11: At any rate, unexpected things can happen.

column4:
あいつらがいて、
マリオネーションギアがある
……そういう未来に。
column5: As long as they're using Marionation Gear...that's the kind of future we can expect.
column11: As long as they're using Marionation Gear... that's the kind of future we can expect.

column5: Enjoy your rest.
column11: Enjoy your rest.

column5: When you open your eyes...
column11: When you open your eyes...

column4:
人形獣王が
あんたたちを待ってるよ。
column5: The Puppet Beast King will be waiting for you.
column11: The Mech Beast King will be waiting for you.
